sn4.12:1.1: Ekaṃ samayaṃ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
sn4.12:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena bhagavā mahatiyā parisāya parivuto dhammaṃ deseti.
sn4.12:2.2: “ayaṃ kho samaṇo gotamo mahatiyā parisāya parivuto dhammaṃ deseti.
sn4.12:2.3: Yannūnāhaṃ yena samaṇo gotamo tenupasaṅkameyyaṃ vicakkhukammāyā”ti.
sn4.12:2.4: Atha kho māro pāpimā yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavantaṃ gāthāya ajjhabhāsi:
sn4.12:5.1: Atha kho māro pāpimā “jānāti maṃ bhagavā, jānāti maṃ sugato”ti dukkhī dummano tatthevantaradhāyīti.
